name: Angry Boss: Idle Office Tycoon
description:
Become the boss and make your employees work for money!

Tap and make money to expand the offices, hire new employees and become the next giant business empire!

Features:

- Endless Idle Game
- Expand the office
- Hire new employees
- Buy new items for the office

Become a boss and keep your employees happy while making money!

Play now!
